definition: to destroy/to spoil/to ruin/to injure/cruel/oppressive/savage/brutal/incomplete/disabled/to remain/to survive/remnant/surplus
disabled/handicapped/deformity on a person or animal

sentences.english: The crater in residual volcanic activity that the volcanic cone within.

definition: to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
